nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in cvmix WSwSBF unit test case.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the surface of the ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the surface of the ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_restoring_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature to restore towards when surface restoring is turned on.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_restoring_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity to restore towards when surface restoring is turned on.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_temperature_piston_velocity
nml_option.description: Piston velocity to control rate of restoring toward config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_restoring_temperature.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_salinity_piston_velocity
nml_option.description: Piston velocity to control rate of restoring toward config_cvmix_WSwSBF_surface_restoring_salinity.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_sensible_heat_flux
nml_option.description: Net sensible heat flux applied when bulk forcing is used. Positive values indicate a net input of heat to ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_latent_heat_flux
nml_option.description: Net latent heat flux applied when bulk forcing is used. Positive values indicate a net input of heat to ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_shortwave_heat_flux
nml_option.description: Net solar shortwave heat flux applied when bulk forcing is used. Positive values indicate a net input of heat to ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_rain_flux
nml_option.description: Net surface rain flux when bulk forcing is used. Positive values indicate a net input of water to ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_evaporation_flux
nml_option.description: Net surface evaporation when bulk forcing is used. Positive values indicate a net input of water to ocean.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_interior_temperature_restoring_rate
nml_option.description: Rate at which temperature is restored toward the initial condition.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_interior_salinity_restoring_rate
nml_option.description: Rate at which salinity is restored toward the initial condition.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_temperature_gradient
nml_option.description: d/dz of temperature.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_salinity_gradient
nml_option.description: d/dz of salinity.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_temperature_gradient_mixed_layer
nml_option.description: d/dz of temperature in mixed temperature layer

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_salinity_gradient_mixed_layer
nml_option.description: d/dz of salinity in mixed salinity layer

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_mixed_layer_depth_temperature
nml_option.description: depth mixed temperature layer
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number but must be less than bottom depth

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_mixed_layer_depth_salinity
nml_option.description: depth mixed salinity layer
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number but less than bottom depth

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_mixed_layer_temperature_change
nml_option.description: temperature jump when moving downward across the mixed layer interface

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_mixed_layer_salinity_change
nml_option.description: salinity jump when moving downward across the mixed layer interface

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_vertical_grid
nml_option.description: prescription of setting the vertical resolution of the test case

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the CVMix WSwSBF unit test case.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_max_windstress
nml_option.description: Maximum surface windstress over the domain.

nml_option.name: config_cvmix_WSwSBF_coriolis_parameter
nml_option.description: Coriolis parameter for WSwSBF test case
